title: Someone Threatened to Throw My Promos Because I Was Being Too Positive
body:
**Never **had this happen before. Malphite tele-ganked bot lane, and my Graves gets the kill. I say "Nice job Mal, awesome teleport :)" and two players who I'll leave anonymous took it upon themselves to inform me that I'm putting them on tilt by being too encouraging, and that if I didn't stop kissing a*ss as they eloquently put it, they'd fail my promos.

I just. I,... I can't. I have no words. We ended up winning, but what the Hell?

replies.body: Some people are hateful fucks.
If being nice puts him on tilt I'd hate to see what being an asshole does to him. How do people like this even manage to make it through a normal day.

[Promo trolls can find out you are in promo using lolking or elophant](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/52oH2crN-promotion-trolls-teammate-sees-im-2-2-in-promo-for-gold-afks-intentionally-unless-i-buy-him-skin)

I know it sounds dumb, but I can sort of understand this. Yesterday I had two vayne games. One was the back end of an ass bad, the first one before that was actually good in hindsight (not great), but I wanted none of it because I thought I was doing terrible.

I felt I was making dumb plays, screwing up my tumble, fail flashed not once but twice that game. My team kept being encouraging and saying I did good when I made plays, but I felt I was doing so terrible that if they weren't doing so well it would have showed a lot more.

I didn't say anything about it and just went with "thanks", but inside I was annoyed at myself for doing so poorly and my teammates treating me like I was doing so well.

Edit: Why am I getting downvoted? I never said anything about being negative towards anyone. I said I was annoyed at myself. Someone apparently can't read. I said I was frustrated because they were being nice and I knew I didn't deserve it. Please read before assuming someone is being negative.
Your team was trying to be helpful and encourage you to do better. Be annoyed with yourself, not at them.

Now that being said, they were also probably on tilt already, because although I would also be offended by you only pointing out Malphite, I certainly wouldn't lose my shit; I'd just ignore it and congratulate myself mentally lol.

I bet they were British. Only Brits have that sort of backwards humor

I'm pretty sure you've misinterpreted what they were saying.

As you've put here, it sounds more like your encouragement was making them more nervous about playing well rather than they were going to play poorly to spite you.

Honestly, coming from someone who's pretty mute in games nowadays, having someone type that much (Regardless if it's positive or negative) is going to irritate me. 

Focus on your gameplay,  worry about your lane, and win.

If you are typing, you're not paying attention to the game, and I don't want to lose a ranked game, ESPECIALLY in my promos.

P.s., inc down votes because people don't want to hear the truth from a former toxic player.
Someone got the kill, and they were a support, so there likely wasn't much else that they could be doing that typing would inhibit them from?
